data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Pachytriton (Caudata: Salamandridae) from Hunan and Guangxi, southeastern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Yuan, Zhi-Yong, Zhang, Bao-Lin, Che, Jing (2016): A new species of the genus Pachytriton (Caudata: Salamandridae) from Hunan and Guangxi, southeastern China. Zootaxa 4085 (2), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4085.2.3
